column4: i want load my iptables rules on startup. can someone tell me where i can put it. Ubuntu works like Slackware? Example: /etc/rc.d/*
i want load my iptables rules on startup. can someone tell me where i can put it. Ubuntu works like Slackware? Example: /etc/rc.d/*
rc.d/ would work, as would /etc/network/interfaces, probably a few other ways too
